1675450.name: Beyond The Nightmares Demo
1675450.description: A stealth and survival horror first-person game fro PC, focused on lovers of suspense, psychological terror and conspiracies, in which a content creator and influencer during the celebrations of the Day of the Dead, on 2 of November, in the Huasteca Potosina, México, known as Xantolo, is persecuted by a cult of death that fuses pre-Hispanic culture with Spanish, They have awakened dark forces and unknown creatures that you will have to face with your ingenuity and solve different puzzles in order to get out alive. Are you ready to face your Nightmares?
